languages.text: {n}Инцендия устало прикрывает глаза и с печалью произносит:{/n} "Нет, Ксавьер. Ересь — всегда ересь. И за ересью всегда приходит Правосудие".
{n}Incendia closes her eyes wearily and says with sadness in her voice,{/n} "No, Xavier. Heresy is always heresy. And judgement always comes in its wake."
languages.original_text: {n}Инцендия устало прикрывает глаза и с печалью произносит:{/n} "Нет, Ксавьер. Ересь — всегда ересь. И за ересью всегда приходит Правосудие".

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia wearily closes her eyes and says with sadness in her voice:{/n} "No, Xavier. Heresy is always heresy. And Judgement always comes after it."
{n}Incendia wearily closes her eyes and says with sadness in her voice:{/n} "No, Xavier. Heresy is always heresy. And Judgement always comes after it."
{n}Incendia wearily closes her eyes and says with sadness in her voice:{/n} "No, Xavier. Heresy is always heresy. And Judgement always follows it."
{n}Incendia wearily closes her eyes and says with sadness in her voice:{/n} "No, Xavier. Heresy is always heresy. And Judgement always follows it."
{n}Incendia closes her eyes wearily and says with sadness in her voice,{/n} "No, Xavier. Heresy is always heresy. And judgement always comes in its wake."
{n}Incendia closes her eyes wearily and says with sadness in her voice,{/n} "No, Xavier. Heresy is always heresy. And judgement always comes in its wake."

languages.text: {n}Incendia ferme les yeux avec lassitude et dit avec une pointe de tristesse :{/n} « Non, Xavier. L'hérésie reste toujours de l'hérésie, et il s'ensuit toujours un jugement. »
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia closes her eyes wearily and says with sadness in her voice,{/n} "No, Xavier. Heresy is always heresy. And judgement always comes in its wake."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia ferme les yeux avec lassitude et dit avec une pointe de tristesse :{/n} « Non, Xavier. L'hérésie reste toujours de l'hérésie, et il s'ensuit toujours un jugement. »

languages.text: {n}Incendia cierra los ojos, agotada, y dice con tristeza:{/n} «No, Xavier. La herejía siempre es herejía. Y el juicio siempre termina por producirse».
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia closes her eyes wearily and says with sadness in her voice,{/n} "No, Xavier. Heresy is always heresy. And judgement always comes in its wake."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia cierra los ojos, agotada, y dice con tristeza:{/n} «No, Xavier. La herejía siempre es herejía. Y el Juicio siempre la sigue».

languages.text: {n}因森蒂娅疲惫地闭上了眼睛，声音中充满了悲伤。{/n}“不，希维尔。无论如何，异端邪说就是异端邪说。异端分子必将遭到审判。”
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia closes her eyes wearily and says with sadness in her voice,{/n} "No, Xavier. Heresy is always heresy. And judgement always comes in its wake."

traits.locale_text: {n}因森蒂娅疲惫地闭上了眼睛，声音中充满了悲伤。{/n}“不，希维尔。无论如何，异端邪说就是异端邪说。异端分子必将遭到审判。”

languages.text: {n}Incendia schließt müde die Augen und sagt mit trauriger Stimme:{/n} "Nein, Xavier. Ketzerei ist immer Ketzerei. Und das Urteil folgt stets."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia closes her eyes wearily and says with sadness in her voice,{/n} "No, Xavier. Heresy is always heresy. And judgement always comes in its wake."

traits.locale_text: {n}Incendia schließt müde die Augen und sagt mit trauriger Stimme:{/n} "Nein, Xavier. Ketzerei ist immer Ketzerei. Und es folgt immer ein Richtspruch auf sie."

languages.text: {n}インセンディアは疲れたように目を閉じ、悲しげな声で言う。{/n}「いや、ザビエル。異端は常に異端なのだ。そして、その後には必ず裁きが訪れる」
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia closes her eyes wearily and says with sadness in her voice,{/n} "No, Xavier. Heresy is always heresy. And judgement always comes in its wake."

traits.locale_text: {n}インセンディアは疲れたように目を閉じ、悲しげな声で言う。{/n}「いや、ザビエル。異端は常に異端なのだ。そして、その後には必ず裁きが訪れる」

languages.text: {n}İncendia, yorgunlukla gözlerini kapatıp üzgün bir sesle konuşuyor.{/n} "Hayır Xavier. Kâfirlik, her zaman kâfirliktir. Ardından da her daim hüküm gelir."
languages.original_text: {n}Incendia closes her eyes wearily and says with sadness in her voice,{/n} "No, Xavier. Heresy is always heresy. And judgement always comes in its wake."
